      void attachUsernameObserver(UsernameObserver usernameObserver)
      Adds the given observer to the list of all UsernameObservers
      Parameters:
      usernameObserver - the UsernameObserver to be added

    • notifyAllUsernameObservers

      void notifyAllUsernameObservers(String message)
      Notifies all the attached observers that the user has selected their username
      Parameters:
      message - the selected username

    • notifyAllGameParametersObservers

      void notifyAllGameParametersObservers(int numPlayers, boolean isExpert)
      Notifies all the attached observers that the user has selected the game parameters
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - the number of player chosen
      isExpert - true if the game is in Expert mode

    • notifyMoveStudentObservers

      void notifyMoveStudentObservers(Color color, Integer islandIndex)
      Notifies all the attached observers that a student has been moved
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the moved student
      islandIndex - the index of the island where the student has eventually been moved to

    • notifyMoveMNObservers

      void notifyMoveMNObservers(int numSteps)
      Notifies all the attached observers that Mother Nature has been moved
      Parameters:
      numSteps - the number of steps Mother Nature has been moved of

    • notifyChooseCloudObservers

      void notifyChooseCloudObservers(int index)
      Notifies all the attached observers that the user has selected a cloud
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the selected cloud

    • notifyPlayAssistantObservers

      void notifyPlayAssistantObservers(int index)
      Notifies all the attached observers that the user has played an assistant
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the selected assistant

    • notifyPlayCharacterObservers

      void notifyPlayCharacterObservers(CharacterName name, Color color, Integer island, List<Color> srcStudents, List<Color> dstStudents)
      Notifies all the attached observers that the user has played a character
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the played character
      color - the color needed for the character effect to develop
      island - the index of the island needed for the character effect to develop
      srcStudents - the students to move/swap
      dstStudents - the students to eventually swap with srcStudents

    • notifyActionChoiceObservers

      void notifyActionChoiceObservers(String name)
      Notifies all the attached observers that the user has chosen an action to be done
      Parameters:
      name - the action selected

    • notifyCharacterChoiceObservers

      void notifyCharacterChoiceObservers(CharacterName name)
      Notifies all the attached observers that the user has chosen a character
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the selected character

    • notifyAllLoadGameObservers

      void notifyAllLoadGameObservers()
      Notifies all the attached observers that the user has chosen to load a game

    • notifyAllChatMessageObservers

      void notifyAllChatMessageObservers(ChatMessage message)
      Notifies all the attached observers that the user sent a message in the game chat
      Parameters:
      message - the sent ChatMessage

    • notifyAllRequestMessagesObservers

      void notifyAllRequestMessagesObservers()
      Notifies all the attached observers that retrieves all messages from server
